name: Ext_R2_ClinicalImpression_fi_item
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.ClinicalImpression.finding.item for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ClinicalImpression.finding.item from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ClinicalImpression|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Specific text or code for finding
element.definition: Specific text of code for finding or diagnosis.
element.comment: `ClinicalImpression.finding.itemCodeableConcept` maps to R5 `ClinicalImpression.finding.item`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ClinicalImpression.finding.itemReference` maps to R5 `ClinicalImpression.finding.item`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Specific text or code for finding

element.comment: `ClinicalImpression.finding.itemCodeableConcept` maps to R5 `ClinicalImpression.finding.item`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ClinicalImpression.finding.itemReference` maps to R5 `ClinicalImpression.finding.item`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Identification of the Condition or diagnosis.
